title: Leaving The Game & Reconnect Again. Still got a punishment
body: The client disconnected me because currently the internet went down. I tried my best to reconnect and I did it, but i still got a punishment for leaving the game. It happens to me for two times already. Can someone explain me why I still punished when I'm already connected to the game?

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm not sure of the exact amount of time before leaverbuster considers you AFK, but I believe it to be roughly around 5 minutes.
Once you're considered AFK you're flagged for punishment by the system, even if you return to the game.
